Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's unexpected involvement with a circus, where he becomes the strongman and faces the vengeful former strongman, Matto Grasso, leading to a series of dramatic events within the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction and Public Fascination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and the arrival of the circus in town, capturing the public's initial wonder and excitement.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Initial Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the man's intervention in a threatening situation involving Billings, which quickly escalates into a dangerous armed confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Backstory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the conversation between Paul Bunyan and the Circus Owner, revealing the history with Matto Grasso and leading to a job offer for Paul Bunyan.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's envious reaction to Paul Bunyan's performance and his escalating plans for revenge, culminating in arson.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico Unleashed and The Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Matto Grasso's second revenge attempt by releasing Gigantico and the ensuing chase involving the circus guard and Matto Grasso.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Arena Fight and Paul Bunyan's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Paul Bunyan's circus involvement with a public fight, authority intervention, and his decision to reject a job offer and return to the North Woods.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's fantastical journey to Tibet, his encounter with a talking severed head, and his entrapment by the Ogress of Tibet, testing his courage and resourcefulness.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Journey Begins and a Mysterious Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage for Marco Polo's adventure in Tibet and introduces a bizarre and unsettling element - a severed talking head.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help
Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's meeting with the King, his encounter with the disguised Ogress, and his subsequent entrapment in her castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance
The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

Major_Arcs.title: Escape from the Ogre's Dungeon
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the plight of a bound man and woman captured by an ogre, and their daring escape using a hidden magic knife, leading to a reunion and unexpected reward.

sub_scenes.title: Swordsman's Capture and Imprisonment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the capture of a swordsman by a cloaked figure and his subsequent imprisonment with a bound woman by an ogre.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Reunion, and Refused Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the escape from the dungeon, the journey to the woman's father, their reunion, and the man's polite refusal of marriage as a reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Tale of the Rajah's Treasure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates a tale of betrayal and revenge centered around a hidden treasure from Agra, detailing a prisoner's bargain, a captain's treachery, and a lieutenant's long-awaited retribution.

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Bargain in the Penal Colony
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as narrator and sets the scene in a penal colony where a prisoner attempts to bargain for freedom by revealing a treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Revenge, and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Captain's betrayal, the Lieutenant's vow of revenge, and his eventual return to England to confront the Captain years later.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England
Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning
Journey to the Attic and Betrayal

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Moral Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the police arriving at the scene, the Captain's desperate escape attempt, and the narrator concluding the tale with a moral message.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Ghost of Vincent Matthews
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, his confrontation with the vengeful ghost of Vincent Matthews, and the resolution brought about by Vincent's sister, Rosalind.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and his initial encounter, followed by the setup for his investigation of the haunted Matthews estate and warnings against it.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate
Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dr. Styx's initial encounter and escalating conflict with the ghostly Vincent Matthews inside the haunted house.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution Through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the philosophical discussion on violence and fear, leading to the summoning of Rosalind, Vincent's sister, whose forgiveness and love ultimately bring peace.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation
Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival
Request for Forgiveness and its Granting
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his relentless pursuit of the Northwest Passage, the challenges faced by his crew, and the tragic mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's First Voyage and False Hope
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the setup for Hudson's first voyage, his acceptance of the Dutch East India Company's proposition, and the initial hope and subsequent disappointment as they explore the Hudson River.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition
Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Hudson's Final Voyage and the Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene narrates Hudson's second voyage, the harsh conditions leading to being trapped in ice, growing crew dissent, and the eventual mutiny and tragic fate of Hudson.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Rescue of the Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on a perilous mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a duel and a budding romance.

sub_scenes.title: The Caliph's Mission and Hassan's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan, the Arabian Knight, and the mission given to him by the Caliph to rescue the kidnapped princess, setting him on his journey.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Journey to the Oasis and Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's arrival at the oasis, his discovery of Tartar presence, and a warning from a traveler about the dangers ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Discovery in the Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's stealthy infiltration of the Tartar camp, his encounter with a sentry, and overhearing information that leads him to the captive princess.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel for Freedom and Honor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Hassan's interrogation by Kurgan, the proposition of a duel, the negotiation of terms, and Hassan's preparation for the unequal combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent

sub_scenes.title: Resolution, Reward, and Budding Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Hassan's mission with Kurgan honoring his word, the princess explaining the kiss, and a hint of romantic feelings developing between Hassan and the Princess.
